question: What river partially forms the old Czech-Moravian land border in Jihlava, Czech Republic?
asked_question_translated: ¿Qué río forma parcialmente la antigua frontera terrestre checo-morava en Jihlava (República Checa)?
answer: El río Jihlava forma parcialmente la antigua frontera terrestre checo-morava en Jihlava, República Checa.
answer_translated_eng: The Jihlava River partially forms the former Czech-Moravian land border in Jihlava, Czech Republic.
